name: Last Odyssey α
description:
The world is conquered.  For a century, the one true Paladin King Kurt has ruled for the one true church of Linor.  Dissenters, secular and religious, are purged.

Three murders haunt the small mining town of Kitto.  Strange pagan markings are found on the victims.

All the victims were human, and fear hangs over the town's original dwellers: the wild.  The Orc working class are not above suspicion as well.  

King Kurt's youngest son, the Inquisitor Christopher is not ready for the case of:

The Wolf, The Devil, & The Unearthed Chamber Setting
  1. The creepy movies Haxan and Carnival of Souls provide materials that crystalize the mood.
  2. Traverse 100 separate maps.
  3. Survive 4 hours of dense content.  Take your time and make it six!
System
  1. Enjoy classic turn based combat.
  2. Craft items from foliage and monster remains.
  3. Brave random, story, and alarm encounters.
  4. Master combat skills and strategically deal and take damage to charge them.
  5. No Magic?  Then how do I-  Overcome your dependence on elemental magic tropes and survive!
Learning
  1. Choose which version of the game to play based on subject matter.
  2. Decide the difficulty level: easy-going to sudden death!
  3. Test through story and encounter based pop quizzes.
